name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル6

description: The lowest level of Impel Down where the world's most dangerous criminals are imprisoned. Unlike other levels, it has no environmental torture - prisoners are simply locked away and erased from history. Many prisoners here have been given either death penalties or life sentences.

keyEvents.title: Ivankov Reveals Knowledge of Crocodile's Weakness
keyEvents.description: On Level 6, Ivankov threatens Crocodile with knowledge of his past weakness to ensure cooperation.
keyEvents.significance: The formation of the unlikely alliance begins here.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe Volunteers to Join the Team
keyEvents.description: Jinbe is freed from his cell on Level 6 and volunteers to help Luffy save Ace.
keyEvents.significance: Jinbe officially joins the escape effort.

keyEvents.title: The Ultimate Team Forms
keyEvents.description: The five-member team is formed on Level 6 before beginning their ascent.
keyEvents.significance: The strongest escape team in Impel Down history is assembled.

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル5

description: The fifth level of Impel Down, a massive freezer where prisoners with bounties over 100,000,000 are kept. The extreme cold causes frostbite and makes food nearly inedible. Wolves that were too brutal for Level 2 roam this level. Den Den Mushi don't function here except near the entrances.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe Debuts Karakusagawara Seiken
keyEvents.description: Jinbe demonstrates his Fish-Man Karate on Level 5, sending guards flying with a delayed shock wave.
keyEvents.significance: First showcase of Jinbe's incredible fighting abilities.

keyEvents.title: Team Reunites with Bentham and Newkama Forces
keyEvents.description: The escape team meets up with Bentham and the Newkama army on Level 5.

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル4

description: The fourth level of Impel Down, defined by a vast cauldron of bubbling blood heated by an enormous fire underneath. The blistering hot air from this level wafts up to Level 3 above it. This is where Daz Bonez (Mr. 1) was imprisoned.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Uses Gomu Gomu no Ame
keyEvents.description: Luffy uses his rapid-fire spinning punch attack against guards on Level 4.

keyEvents.title: Crocodile Recruits Mr. 1
keyEvents.description: Crocodile finds and frees Daz Bonez from his cell on Level 4, with Mr. 1 immediately agreeing to rejoin him.
keyEvents.significance: Reunites the former Baroque Works leaders.

keyEvents.title: Mass Battle on Level 4
keyEvents.description: A massive battle erupts between the combined escape forces and Impel Down's guards and Jailer Beasts.
keyEvents.significance: The prison break reaches its peak intensity.

name.japanese: インペルダウン - レベル2

description: The second level of Impel Down where prisoners are hunted by various deadly beasts including basilisks, sphinxes, and other monsters. This level serves as a hunting ground where prisoners must evade these creatures.

keyEvents.title: Buggy and Mr. 3 Reach Level 2
keyEvents.description: Buggy and Galdino successfully reach Level 2 in their separate escape attempt.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the parallel escape route that will converge with Luffy's later.

description: A massive gate that controls access between Enies Lobby, Impel Down, and Marineford. It can only be opened from the inside and serves as a critical chokepoint for Marine operations. Three Gates of Justice form a triangle of justice connecting the three key World Government facilities.

keyEvents.title: Ace Transported Through Gate of Justice
keyEvents.description: Ace is shown being transported via Marine warship through the Gate of Justice toward Marineford for his execution.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that time is running out for Luffy to save Ace.

description: Marine Headquarters, the primary base of operations for the Marines. It houses the Fleet Admiral's office and serves as the main military fortress of the World Government. The island is heavily fortified and serves as one of the three locations connected by the Gates of Justice.

keyEvents.title: Ace Being Transported to Marineford
keyEvents.description: Ace is being transported to Marineford where his public execution will take place, setting up the impending war.
keyEvents.significance: Foreshadows the massive Summit War that will take place at Marineford.
